document_name: Enhancing Coverage and Management Effectiveness of the Subsystem of Forest Protected Areas in Turkeys National System of Protected Areas

outputs.output_descr: Enhance coverage and management effectiveness within the Forest Protected Areas sub system by demonstrating cost-effective management approaches in Kure Mountains National Park (KMNP) and then replicating to the remaining 8 forest hot spots.

project_descr: PIMS-1988: Enhancing Coverage and Management Effectiveness of the Subsystem of Forest Protected Areas in Turkey%s National System of Protected Areas
